body: Honestly this isn't mind break it's moral degeneration. They're still the people they were before, with fully intact reasoning, they're just lewd, immoral nymphos now

Honestly because this story feels so honest wholeheartly and natural after the initial push I extra made an account to add this to my favourites, leave this comment and reread it again. Because I searched for over a year to find it again.
I'm not the healthiest but that guy is annoying af to look at
fat man........ well off to futa after this ;-;
Go read Ou-sama applied,same principle but at least the dude isn't ugly
Rogare que existan mas mangas donde el gordito encuentre su verdadero amor, y no ande de violo :V

i enjoy it when the females are into the sex, yay. I mean the main guy was a fat dude...but really how many of us are similar in size ya know. At least he wasnt all gross, he was just a simple man with simple desires.

@TorakWolf Artists should do whatever they what because a drawing shouldn't offend a sane and decent person. If this bullshit against rape continues next thing we know people are defending elves and orcs because the evil artists portray them as nothing more than sex machines. Grow the fuck up. Nobody is a "beast" just because they like drawings  of fictional characters doing certain fictional things.
people saying fat ass is bad but short haired girl looked like a guy in some pages

The problem isn't if the guy is fat or whatever, but wheter he has at least descent facial features... I think the disgusting fat guy is a way to show either the artist's or the target public hatred against the type of women they consider inadequate.

Show I agree with the general opinion against over competitive and megalomaniac individuals, going to sexual assault is even worse, and putting the gender of the "targets" into focus is a way to spread sexist opinions, which should never be, even using artistic licenses.

There's "descent" histories (truth be told, this does NOT turn on me at all) involving  violence at different levels, like for example "I ran into bandits in the forest and got raped" (kinda stupid title, right?). Unless you are a total beast in human skin, you won't get a hard-on, but man, the story is gold. And the art? God level.
Not a fat protagonist? Thats pretty hard to find.
i dont really take a liking into fat bastards but atleast the girls were pleasing to look at
Another fat fuck. Can we have a male protagonist that is visually appealing to look at?
